name: The Edge of Civilization
description: Take control of Captain Arbar, a soldier from the Special Forces unit The Galaxy Peace Keepers. Captain Arbar was supposed to meet with an informant to collect information on a stockpile of gold on the stations planet. However the informant did not show to the meet and it is now up to Captain Arbar to make his way on board the Space Station where the informant lives and works to get the information.
